item.title: Three killed, 12 were injured in road accident: Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[Three people, including an elderly man and a woman, died, and 12 others were injured in Raichur districtâ€™s Deodurga taluk on Tuesday.
According to police sources, one person died on the spot, the other at the hospital, and 12 were injured in an accident that occurred near Karigudda village in Deodurga taluk.
The dead were identified as 47-year-old Mallappa and 30-year-old Monnamma, respectively. The police shifted the injured to the taluk hospital, where they are getting treatment.
